name: Lisdexamfetamine

dosing.notes: Take in the morning with or without food. Prodrug — converted to d-amphetamine in the GI tract, reducing abuse potential of IV/intranasal use. Approved for ADHD and BED.

canadian_clinical.titration_schedule: Increase by 10-20 mg every 1-2 weeks based on response.
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Start 30 mg each morning. Can titrate to 50-70 mg over 2-4 weeks if tolerated.
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Start 30 mg. Review at 4 weeks. Target symptom control with minimal side effects.

cautions.renal: Reduce dose in moderate renal impairment (CrCl 15-30: max 50 mg/day). Avoid in severe impairment.
cautions.hepatic: No specific data; use caution in severe hepatic impairment.
cautions.pregnancy: Avoid; amphetamines associated with neonatal withdrawal and prematurity.

warnings: Cardiovascular: increased BP and HR — contraindicated in symptomatic cardiovascular disease
Psychiatric effects: new or worsening psychosis, mania, aggression
High abuse potential — Schedule III controlled substance
Do not use within 14 days of MAOI
